metadata.Title: CVE-2015-4164 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The compat_iret function in Xen 3.1 through 4.5 iterates the wrong way through a loop, which allows local 32-bit PV guest administrators to cause a denial of service (large loop and system hang) via a hypercall_iret call with EFLAGS.VM set.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-4164` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxen-4.4 - 4.4.2-0ubuntu0.14.04.2
libxen-ocaml - 4.4.2-0ubuntu0.14.04.2
libxenstore3.0 - 4.4.2-0ubuntu0.14.04.2
xen-hypervisor-4.1-amd64 - 4.4.2-0ubuntu0.14.04.2
xen-hypervisor-4.3-amd64 - 4.4.2-0ubuntu0.14.04.2
xen-hypervisor-4.3-armhf - 4.4.2-0ubuntu0.14.04.2
xen-hypervisor-4.4-amd64 - 4.4.2-0ubuntu0.14.04.2
xen-hypervisor-4.4-arm64 - 4.4.2-0ubuntu0.14.04.2
xen-hypervisor-4.4-armhf - 4.4.2-0ubuntu0.14.04.2
xen-system-amd64 - 4.4.2-0ubuntu0.14.04.2
xen-system-arm64 - 4.4.2-0ubuntu0.14.04.2
